import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './MeetingRegistrationModal.css'; interface MeetingRegistrationModalProps { isOpen: boolean; onClose: () => void; onSave: (meetingData: any) => void; } const MeetingRegistrationModal: React.FC = ({ isOpen, onClose, onSave }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'basic' | 'agenda'>('basic'); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // 기본 정보 meetingName: '', organizer: '김철수 (제품기획팀)', date: '', startTime: '', endTime: '', location: '', // Webex 정보 webexUrl: 'https://company.webex.com/meet/...', meetingKey: '', meetingPassword: '', // 참석자 attendees: '', // 안건 정보 background: '', terminology: '용어: 정의\nMVP: Minimum Viable Product\nKPI: Key Performance Indicator' }); const handleInputChange = (field: string, value: string) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSave = () => { onSave(formData); onClose(); }; if (!isOpen) return null; return (
{activeTab === 'basic' ? '새 회의 등록' : '회의 안건'}
{activeTab === 'basic' ? (
{/* 기본 정보 섹션 */}
handleInputChange('meetingName', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('date', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('location', e.target.value)} />
{/* Webex 정보 섹션 */}

Webex 회의 정보

handleInputChange('webexUrl', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('meetingKey', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('meetingPassword', e.target.value)} />
{/* 참석자 섹션 */}
handleInputChange('attendees', e.target.value)} />
) : (
